Close Upgrade //setting Setting Language About Policy Rate Invite Friends Subscription Feedback //faq item My smartphone can’t find any device for combine with. - Ensure the same Wifi connection.\n- Turn off VPN.\n- Shorten the distance between devices.\n- Check supported devices. My smartphone gets stuck “connecting” to couple with TV. Restart the smartphone’s wifi and reconnect to devices.\n- Turn off the TV and unplug its it for a minutes, the turn it on again.\n- Shorten the distance between your phone and the TV. My devices could connect before, but those do not work now? If your devices could connect previously, those can be definitely connected again.\nYou may check VPN, the same Wifi, and the distance. You even deal with the problems by restarting your devices. It shows that my device is not supported. What should I do? This means that your device does not support the screen mirroring function.\nYou could find supported devices to be able to mirror TV. Is my personal information or mobile data completely secured? - We always ensure your information on your smartphone and connected devices are confidential. Thus, you can mirror to TV without worry. The connection can be interrupted for a while If you turn on the battery-saving or the smart wifi-researching mode on your smartphone, the connection may be interrupted. \nPlease make sure you devices are connecting to the same Wifi. The pin code will secure your transmission. You can turn it off on the Setting to disable the pin code.
